descriptionHtml:
REUIRE ApachiiSkyHair!!!
-------------------------------------------------background----------------------------------------------------------------
Aventus Was a commender in the last Spartan war, when all the spartans were
slaughtered by the impariels, after the war Aventus got into the dark arts and before
he got too deep into it he died and got revived by dark ancient spell which only
knwon by his family was casted by his mother sylvania on his dead body to revive him
but the cost of reviving one person means one most die, his mother knew it and
wanted him not to practice more in the dark arts so she gave up her life for him, and
casted a memory spell on him and erased his memory, and for 10 years Aventus
searched for his master and now he wandered into the bannered mare at whiterun.
----------------------------------------------------extract------------------------------------------------------------------
1. open up the rar.
2. drag the data folder inside the rar file to your skyrim folder
(C:Program Files (x86)Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)
3. Enjoy!
--------------------------------------------------------Stats-----------------------------------------------------------------
Level: 20
Health: 208
Magicka: 113
Stamina: 114
One Handed: 45 Two Handed: 25 Archery: 53 Destruction Magic: 53
Restoration Magic: 53
-----------------------------------------------------Spells-------------------------------------------------------------------
Frostbite, Flames, LightningBolt, Fireball, FlameCloak
